description:
Make education more exciting with interaction.

SeewoIwbAssistant provides functions such as scanning QR codes to connect, taking photos to upload, and screen mirroring from mobile phones. You can use this software and the EasiNote app to pair your mobile with your PC, enabling communication between them. After scanning the QR code with EasiNote to connect to SeewoIwbAssistant, the assistant can help you conveniently mirror your phone screen to the desktop, control presentations on desktop, and use voice to control the computer.
